sentences.en: A policeman has been shot dead in an ambush.
sentences.cn: 一名警察在一次伏击中中弹身亡。

sentences.en: Fear ambush at every tree and tuft of grass.
Fearing an ambush, the enemy troops advanced cautiously.
sentences.cn: 敌军怕遭埋伏, 战战兢兢地向前移动.

sentences.en: Four men led by a sergeant lay in ambush at the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 由一名中士率领的四名士兵埋伏在十字路口.

sentences.en: In winter the danger of ambush is much reduced.
sentences.cn: 冬天，遭伏击的危险大大减少。

sentences.en: It was not a stalk; it was an ambush.
sentences.cn: 这不是暗暗跟踪 而是 伏袭.

sentences.en: Its shadows are an ambush, its lights a surprise.
sentences.cn: 它的阴影象伏兵千万, 它的光泽令人惊异.

sentences.en: Our battalion would lie in ambush on the mountainside.
Our soldiers lay in ambush in the jungle for the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我方战士埋伏在丛林中等待敌人.

sentences.en: Several passers - by were killed in the ambush.
sentences.cn: 几名 过路人 在伏击中被杀害.

sentences.en: The enemy chased the decoys down to the place of ambush.
sentences.cn: 敌人将诱骗者一直追到伏兵所在地.

sentences.en: The Guatemalan army says rebels ambushed and killed 10 patrolmen.
sentences.cn: 危地马拉军方称叛军伏击并杀死了10名巡逻兵。

sentences.en: The police lay in ambush for the thieves.
sentences.cn: 警察暗中等候那些小偷.

sentences.en: The soldiers were killed in an ambush.
They had remained quiet, laying their terrible ambush.
sentences.cn: 人家长期不声不响, 却一直在布置可怕的圈套.

sentences.en: They were like a tiger lying in ambush for its prey.
sentences.cn: 他们就象老虎候食一样守在那里.

words.tran_cn: 埋伏；机动侦查；伏击专家

phrases.tran_cn: 隐性营销；埋伏式营销；伏击式营销

trans.tran_cn: 埋伏，伏击，伏击者，伏兵，伏击点
trans.tran_en: a sudden attack on someone by people who have been hiding and waiting for them, or the place where this happens
a sudden attack on someone by people who have been hiding and waiting for them, or the place where this happens
If a group of people ambush their enemies, they attack them after hiding and waiting for them
